stockexchange.model

Interface IStockExchangeModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockExchangeModel

    public interface IStockExchangeModel
    This is the interface of the StockExchangeModel. It offers all the methods and operations that can be performed to create and edit a portfolio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buyShares(java.lang.String name, int quantity)
      Buy the specified number of shares of the specified company.
      void createPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Creates a portfolio with the given name.The user can perform various functions on this portfolio like buy shares and add to this portfolio, sell shares present in this portfolio, get the current contents of this portfolio and remove the portfolio.
      java.lang.String displayShareDetails(java.lang.String nameOfShare, java.lang.String date)
      Displays the details of the shares that the user intends to buy and add to his/her portfolio.
      java.lang.String getCostBasisOnDate(java.lang.String date)
      This method is responsible for giving cost basis on certain date.
      java.lang.String getCurrentCostBasis()
      This method is responsible for giving cost basis at current time.
      java.lang.String getCurrentPortfolioDetails()
      Displays all the details of the specified existing portfolios.
      java.lang.String getCurrentPortfolioDetails(java.lang.String date)
      Displays all the details of the specified existing portfolios before specified date.
      java.lang.String investMoney(double totalAmount, java.lang.String date)
      Invests the given amount in the existing shares by distributing amount equally.
      java.lang.String investMoney(double totalAmount, java.lang.String date, double[] percentage)
      Invests the given amount in the existing shares using the percentage splits.
      java.lang.String regularInvestMoney(double totalAmount, java.lang.String date, int interval)
      Invests the total amount regularly from starting date in the existing shares in regular intervals.

      Invest the total amount regularly from starting date till ending date in the existing in regular intervals.

      Invests the total amount regularly from starting date in the existing shares in regular intervals using percentage splits.

      Invest the total amount regularly from starting date till ending date in the existing in regular intervals using percentage split.

      Removes an existing portfolio with a given name.

    • Method Detail

      • createPortfolio

        void createPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a portfolio with the given name.The user can perform various functions on this portfolio like buy shares and add to this portfolio, sell shares present in this portfolio, get the current contents of this portfolio and remove the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name with which the portfolio will be created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there already exists a portfolio with the given name

      • selectPortfolio

        void selectPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Selects a portfolio before performing and action on the intended portfolio. A portfolio needs to be selected before it can be viewed or updated (Buy shares to add to a portfolio, sell shares from the portfolio, remove the portfolio or actions like getCurrentPortfolioDetails.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the portfolio that needs to be selected
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there exists no portfolio with the given name for selection.

      • setCommission

        void setCommission(double commission)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                   java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the commission of each transaction.
        Parameters:
        commission - commission on each transaction
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if portfolio is not selected
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the commission is negative

      • removePortfolio

        void removePortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes an existing portfolio with a given name.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the portfolio that needs to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there exists no portfolio with the given name for deletion

      • displayShareDetails

        java.lang.String displayShareDetails(java.lang.String nameOfShare,
                                     java.lang.String date)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Displays the details of the shares that the user intends to buy and add to his/her portfolio.
        Parameters:
        nameOfShare - is the ticker Symbol of the share that the user needs to know the information about.
        date - is the date on which the user needs to know the information about a particular share
        Returns:
        the details of the requested Stock - Ticker Symbol of the share opening Price - Highest price of the Day - Lowest Price of the day - Closing Price - Volume of the shares
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the date given is not in the specified format or the given date is a weekend or a national holiday or if the portfolio is not selected
        java.io.IOException

      • buyShares

        void buyShares(java.lang.String name,
               int quantity)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Buy the specified number of shares of the specified company.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the company whose stocks are intended to be bought
        quantity - is the quantity of the intended stocks
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the portfolio on which this operation needs to be performed is not selected.

      • sellShares

        void sellShares(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String date)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sells all the shares of the specified company existing in the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        name - is the ticker Symbol company whose shares are intended to be sold
        date - date on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the portfolio on which this operation needs to be performed is not selected.

        quantity - of shares that need to be sold
        cost - of the shares that need to be sold
        date - date on which share is to be sold
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the portfolio on which this operation needs to be performed is not selected

                             java.lang.String date,
                             double[] percentage)

        Parameters:
        totalAmount - amount to be investment
        date - date on which investment is to be done
        percentage - split in which investment is to be made
        Returns:
        status after investment

        Parameters:
        totalAmount - amount to be invested
        date - on which investment is to be done
        interval - in which investment is to be done
        Returns:
        status after the operation

      • regularInvestMoney

        java.lang.String regularInvestMoney(double totalAmount,
                                    java.lang.String startDate,
                                    java.lang.String endDate,
                                    int interval)
        Invest the total amount regularly from starting date till ending date in the existing in regular intervals.
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - amount to be invested
        startDate - from which investment is to be done
        endDate - till which investment is to be done
        interval - in which investment is to be done
        Returns:
        status after investment

      • regularInvestMoneyWithPercentage

                                                  java.lang.String date,
                                                  int interval,
                                                  double[] percentageWeights)
        Invests the total amount regularly from starting date in the existing shares in regular intervals using percentage splits.
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - amount to be invested
        date - on which investment is to be done
        interval - in which investment is to be done
        percentageWeights - percentage split in which investment is to be done
        Returns:
        status after the operation

      • regularInvestMoneyWithPercentage

        java.lang.String regularInvestMoneyWithPercentage(double totalAmount,
                                                  java.lang.String startDate,
                                                  java.lang.String endDate,
                                                  int interval,
                                                  double[] percentageWeights)
        Invest the total amount regularly from starting date till ending date in the existing in regular intervals using percentage split.
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - amount to be invested
        startDate - from which investment is to be done
        endDate - till which investment is to be done
        interval - in which investment is to be done
        percentageWeights - percentage split in which investment is to be done
        Returns:
        status after investment
